subject: Thanks for being our customer
body:
Dear valued member.
It's time for Summer discounts. Summer Discounts from CanadianPharmacy. Buy cheap Canadian products and save up to 20%.
Your health and wellness is the main focus of our professional team and we are glad to offer you really top quality products. 
To order your products just click here and follow step-by-step instructionshttp://copytalk.hk
Easy and secure ordering process.All your personal information will remain private and confidential.The highest quality customer service. Fast and safe delivery. 
Yours faithfully,Bryan Dempsey
